job.description: Test multi-node authentication using Ansible playbook
job.name: ansible-playbook-multi-node-test

entry.value:
- hosts: all gather_facts: yes tasks: - name: Display hostname debug: msg: "Connected to {{ inventory_hostname }} successfully"
- name: Verify authentication command: whoami register: current_user
- name: Show current user debug: msg: "Authenticated as {{ current_user.stdout }}"
- name: Test file creation file: path: /tmp/multi_node_auth_test_{{ inventory_hostname }} state: touch mode: "0644"
- name: Verify file was created stat: path: /tmp/multi_node_auth_test_{{ inventory_hostname }} register: test_file
- name: Assert file exists assert: that: - test_file.stat.exists success_msg: "Multi-node authentication test passed for {{ inventory_hostname }}" fail_msg: "Multi-node authentication test failed for {{ inventory_hostname }}"
